ygData.subject: Re: Post Patch Pottery Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay this is with a 110 charisma enchanter .... Large bowl sketch 15gp Cake rounds - 1pp, 2sp Pie Tins - 1pp, 2sp Muffin Tins - 1pp, 2sp I sure hope everyone
ygData.messageBody:
Okay this is with a 110 charisma enchanter ....

Large bowl sketch 15gp
Cake rounds - 1pp, 2sp
Pie Tins - 1pp, 2sp
Muffin Tins - 1pp, 2sp

I sure hope everyone bought sketches last night. My server is not up yet so I
cannot say what the SELL price is. As soon as I can I will repost.

Other prices generally lower with the lowest around 1sp. I assume they want
people to still be able to gain skill ... up until the high level it appears.

2 new sketches:
Vial
Sealed Vial?

For poison maybe??? This is from memory as i am not logged on. There may have
been three vial sketches instead of 2. I did not check my pottery book for new
recipes.

-Haytred


David Harrell wrote:

> From: "David Harrell" <pokes@...>
>
> OK, has anybody found out the situation in regards to our beloved craft and
> the latest patches?
>
> Just curious about pricing, selling, etc. The questions I have are:
>
> How much has the cost gone up on the sketches? Give a before and after
> please
> How much has the sell back value of sketches been altered? Once again
> before and after
> Has the success rate been modified any?
> Has the sale prices of finished products been altered?
> Has there been any versioning of the sketches? Meaning do the old sketches
> sell for one price (back to merchants) and the new ones sell for a higher
> price.
> Are there any new sketches and additions to the pottery books?
>
> dwh
